alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe; Torrance (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:39PM MDT until August 28 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL GUADALUPE AND NORTHEASTERN TORRANCE COUNTIES... At 538 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles north of Encino, or 17 miles northwest of Vaughn, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Encino. This includes the following highways... Highway 285 between Mile Markers 223 and 235. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 246 and 267. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. High winds and large hail can spread quickly across open rangeland.
